name: Tutorial 9 - Loops
definition:
[[LOOP:tutorial]]
A <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-1-colours>> <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-2-gems>>
[[ENDLOOP:tutorial:5]]

Breaking that down the 'LOOP:tutorial' represents the start of the loop and the loop name.
the 'ENDLOOP:tutorial:5' represents the end of the loop for that variable and the maximum number of
iterations. Each loop will do at least one pass.
